title: Creating basic closures
question: This code is valid Swift – true or false?
hint: Closures don't take parameters in parentheses, and they are case-sensitive just like regular functions.

wrong.reason: The parentheses after upgrade should not be there..
There should be an equals sign before the opening brace.
Closure names are case-sensitive, and this attempts to call meetfriends() rather than meetFriends().
Unlike functions, closures put their parameters inside the opening brace.
